reviews.review_msg: Passionate, concise and fun. Anne is a prof that we all wish we have for all courses at University. She makes learning fun and at the same time allow us to push ourselves further.To top it off, even after graduation, she is willing to put in recommendations for your resume.

David is probably the best prof I've had in my five years at SFU. His lectures are engaging, interesting and he's a really funny, genuine guy. He's always willing to help with projects and answer questions, super supportive.
Zoe is great. She is very approchable and interested in what you have to say.
